spec_data.Name: perl-File-Find-Rule-VCS
spec_data.Description:
Many tools need to be equally useful both on ordinary files, and on code
that has been checked out from revision control systems.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:38:57 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Exclude files/directories for Version Control Systems
